title: Unhandled Exception - panic: runtime error: index out of range [32] with length 32
body:
I run a cluster of over 30 Erigon full archive nodes. About 30-50% have been having this unhandled panic causing the application to completely exit. I restarted the Application, and it seems to progress.

May be related to:
- https://github.com/golang/go/issues/60860
- https://github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/issues/1173

**Version**
```
/home/erigon/erigon/build/bin/erigon -v
erigon version 2.49.0-dev-8983128d
```

**Command**
#bin/bash
```
/home/erigon/erigon/build/bin/erigon \
--chain=mainnet \
--torrent.upload.rate="1024mb" \
--torrent.download.rate="1024mb" \
--datadir="$(eval echo ~$USER)/erigon-eth" \
--internalcl \
--chain=mainnet \
--port=30501 \
--http.port=9201 \
--authrpc.port=9101 \
--authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 \
--authrpc.vhosts=* \
--torrent.port=42501 \
--private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090 \
--nat="extip:$(curl -s ifconfig.me)" \
--http \
--http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool \
--ws \
--ws.compression
```
